# disableCollection(for:)

**Instance Method**

Stops automatically calculating statistics for the quantity type.

## Declaration

```swift
func disableCollection(for quantityType: HKQuantityType)
```

## Calculating statistics

- **enableCollection(for:predicate:)**: Begins automatically calculating statistics for samples that match the quantity type and predicate.

items.description: Begins automatically calculating statistics for samples that match the quantity type and predicate.
items.name: enableCollection(for:predicate:)
